fluff.name: Artificier
entries: Masters of unlocking magic in everyday objects, artificers are supreme inventors. They see magic as a complex system waiting to be decoded and controlled. Artificers use tools to channel arcane power, crafting temporary and permanent magical objects. To cast a spell, an artificer could use {@item alchemist's supplies|PHB} to create a potent elixir, {@item calligrapher's supplies|PHB} to inscribe a sigil of power on an ally's armor, or {@item tinker's eines|PHB} to craft a temporary charm. The magic of artificers is tied to their tools and their talents.

entries.name: Arcane Science
entries: In the world of Eberron, arcane magic has been harnessed as a form of science and deployed throughout society. Artificers reflect this development. Their knowledge of magical devices, and their ability to infuse mundane items with magical energy, allows the grand magical projects of Eberron to continue running. During the Last War, artificers were marshaled on a massive scale. Many lives were saved because of the inventions of brave artificers, but also countless lives were lost because of the mass destruction that artificers' creations unleashed.

entries.name: Seekers of New Lore
entries: Nothing excites an artificer quite like uncovering a new metal or discovering a source of elemental energy. In artificer circles, new inventions and strange discoveries create the most excitement. Artificers who wish to make a mark must find something fresh, rather than uncover someone else's work.

This drive for novelty pushes artificers to become adventurers. Eberron's main travel routes and populated regions have long since been explored. Thus, artificers take to the edge of civilization in hopes of making the next great discovery in arcane research.

entries.name: Creating an Artificier
entries: When creating an artificer character, think about your character's background and drive for adventure. Does the character have a rival? What is the character's relationship with the artisan or artificer who taught the basics of the craft? Talk to your DM about the role played by artificers in the campaign, and what sort of organizations and NPCs you might have ties to.

entries.name: Artificers in Other Worlds
entries: Eberron is the world most associated with artificers, yet the class can be found throughout the multiverse. In the Regnes Oblidats, for example, the island of Lantan is home to many artificers, and in the world of Dragonlance, tinker gnomes are often members of this class. The strange technologies in the Barrier Peaks of the World of Greyhawk have inspired some folk to walk the path of the artificer, and in Mystara, various nations employ artificers to keep airships and other wondrous devices operational. In the City of Sigil, artificers share discoveries from throughout the cosmos, and one in particular—the gnome inventor named Vi—runs a multiverse-spanning business from there. In the worldcity Ravnica, the Izzet League trains numerous artificers, the destructiveness of whom is unparalleled in other worlds, except by the tinker gnomes of Krynn.

classFeature.name: Andròmines Màgiques
entries: A nivell 1, you learn how to invest a spark of magic into mundane objects. To use this ability, you must have {@item eines de lladre|PHB} or {@item eines d'artesania|PHB} in hand. You then touch a Tiny nonmagical object com a acció and give it one of the following magical properties (escull):

items: The object sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

Whenever tapped by a creature, the object emits a recorded message that can be heard fins a 10 peus away. You utter the message when you bestow this property on the object, and the recording can be no more than 6 seconds long.
The object continuously emits your choice of an odor or a nonverbal sound (wind, waves, chirping, or the like). The chosen phenomenon is perceivable fins a 10 peus away.
A static visual effect appears on one of the object's surfaces. This effect can be a picture, up to 25 words of text, lines and shapes, or a mixture of these elements, as you like.

entries: The chosen property lasts indefinitely. Com a acció, you can touch the object and end the property early.

You can bestow magic on multiple objects, touching one object each time you use this feature, though a single object can only bear one property at a time. The maximum number of objects you can affect with this feature at one time is equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim d'1 object). If you try to exceed your maximum, the oldest property immediately ends, and then the new property applies.

classFeature.name: Optional Rule: Firearm Proficiency
entries: The secrets of creating and operating gunpowder weapons have been discovered in various corners of the D&D multiverse. classFeature.name: Llançament de Conjurs
entries: You have studied the workings of magic and how to channel it through objects. As a result, you have gained the ability to cast spells. To observers, you don't appear to be casting spells in a conventional way; you look as if you're producing wonders using mundane items or outlandish inventions.

entries.name: Tools Required
entries: You produce your artificer spell effects through your tools. You must have a spellcasting focus—specifically {@item eines de lladre|phb} or some kind of {@item eines d'artesania|phb|artisan's tool}—in hand when you cast any spell with this Spellcasting feature (meaning the spell has an 'M' component when you cast it). You must be proficient with the tool to use it in this way. See {@book capítol 5|PHB|4}, "Equipment," in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB} for descriptions of these tools.
After you gain the Infusionar Objecte feature a nivell 2, you can also use any item bearing one of your infusions as a spellcasting focus.

entries.name: The Magic of Artifice
entries: As an artificer, you use tools when you cast your spells. When describing your spellcasting, think about how you're using a tool to perform the spell effect. If you cast {@spell curar ferides} using {@item alchemist's supplies|PHB}, you could be quickly producing a salve. If you cast it using {@item tinker's eines|PHB}, you might have a miniature mechanical spider that binds wounds. When you cast {@spell poison spray}, you could fling foul chemicals or use a wand that spits venom. The effect of the spell is the same as for a spellcaster of any other class, but your method of spellcasting is special.

The same principle applies when you prepare your spells. As an artificer, you don't study a spellbook or pray to prepare your spells. Instead, you work with your tools and create the specialized items you'll use to produce your effects. If you replace {@spell curar ferides} with {@spell heat metal}, you might be altering the device you use to heal—perhaps modifying a tool so that it channels heat instead of healing energy.

Such details don't limit you in any way or provide you with any benefit beyond the spell's effects. You don't have to justify how you're using tools to cast a spell. But describing your spellcasting creatively is a fun way to distinguish yourself from other spellcasters.

entries.name: Cantrips (0-Level Spells)
entries: A nivell 1, coneixes 2 trucs (escull) from the {@filter artificer spell list|spells|level=0|class=Artificer}. A nivells superiors, aprendràs més trucs de artificer (escull), que pots veure a la Columna de Trucs Coneguts de la taula de Artificer.
When you gain a level en aquesta classe, you can replace one of the artificer cantrips you know with another cantrip from the artificer spell list.

entries.name: Preparar i Llançar Conjurs
entries: The Artificer table mostra les ranures de conjur que tens per llançar els artificer spells. To cast one of your artificer spells of 1st level or higher, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. Recuperes totes les ranures de conjur quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

Pots preparar la llista de artificer spells that are available for you to cast, choosing from the {@filter artificer spell list|spells|class=Artificer}. Esculls un número de artificer spells equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència + half your artificer level, arrodonint a la baixa (mínim d'1 conjur). Has de tenir una ranura del nivell d'un conjur per a poder preparar-lo.

For example, if you are a artificier de nivell 5, you have four 1st-level and two 2nd-level ranures de conjur. With an Intel·ligència of 14, your list of prepared spells can include four spells of 1st or 2nd level, in any combination. Si et prepares el conjur de nivell 1 {@spell curar ferides}, you can cast it using a 1st-level or a 2nd-level slot. Casting the spell doesn't remove it from your list of prepared spells.

You can change your list of prepared spells quan acabis un Descans Llarg. Preparar una nova llista de artificer spells requires time spent tinkering with your spellcasting focuses: at least 1 minute per spell level for each spell on your list.

entries.name: Habilitat de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: La teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs pels conjurs de artificer és l'Intel·ligència; your understanding of the theory behind magic allows you to wield these spells with superior skill. You use your Intel·ligència whenever an artificer spell refers to your habilitat de llançament de conjurs. A més, you use el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència when setting the saving throw DC for an artificer spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one.

entries.name: Llançar com a Ritual
entries: You can cast an artificer spell as a ritual if that spell has the ritual tag and you have the spell prepared.

classFeature.name: Infusionar Objecte
entries: A nivell 2, you gain the ability to imbue mundane items with certain magical infusions. The magic items you create with this feature are effectively prototypes of permanent items.

entries.name: Artificer Infusions
entries: Artificers have invented numerous magical infusions, extraordinary processes that rapidly create magic items. To many, artificers seem like wonderworkers, accomplishing in hours what others need weeks to complete.
The description of each of the following infusions details the type of item that can receive it, along with whether the resulting magic item requires attunement.
Some infusions specify a minimum artificer level. You can't learn such an infusion until you are at least that level.
Unless an infusion's description says otherwise, you can't learn an infusion more than once.

entries.name: Infusing an Item
entries: Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can touch a nonmagical object and imbue it with one of your artificer infusions, turning it into a magic item. An infusion works on only certain kinds of objects, as specified in the infusion's description. If the item requires attunement, you can attune yourself to it the instant you infuse the item. If you decide to attune to the item later, you must do so using the normal process for attunement (see "Attunement" in chapter 7 of the {@book Guia del Mestre de Masmorres|DMG}).

Your infusion remains in an item indefinitely, but when you die, the infusion vanishes after a number of days have passed equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim d'1 day). The infusion also vanishes if you give up your knowledge of the infusion for another one.

You can infuse more than one nonmagical object quan acabis un Descans Llarg; the maximum number of objects appears in the Infused Items column of the Artificer table. You must touch each of the objects, and each of your infusions can be in only one object at a time. Moreover, no object can bear more than one of your infusions at a time. If you try to exceed your maximum number of infusions, the oldest infusion immediately ends, and then the new infusion applies.
If an infusion ends on an item that contains other things, like a bag of holding, its contents harmlessly appear in and around its space.

classFeature.name: Anàlisi d'Objectes Màgics

You know the artificer spells {@spell detectar màgia} i {@spell identify}, and you can cast them as rituals. You don't need to provide a material component when casting {@spell identify} with this class feature.

When you gain a magic item from this feature, it reflects long hours of study, tinkering, and experimentation that allowed you to finally complete the item. You are assumed to work on this item in your leisure time and to finish it when you level up. You complete another item (escull) Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe: 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th level. The item you choose must be on the list for your current artificer level or a lower level. These magic items are detailed in the Guia del Mestre de Masmorres.

classFeature.name: Infondre Màgia
entries: Començant a nivell 4, you gain the ability to channel your artificer spells into objects for later use. When you cast an artificer spell with a casting time of 1 action, you can increase its casting time to 1 minute. Si ho fas and hold a nonmagical item throughout the casting, you expend a spell slot, but none of the spell's effects occur. Instead, the spell transfers into that item for later use if the item doesn't already contain a spell from this feature.

Any creature holding the item thereafter can use an action to activate the spell if the creature has an Intel·ligència score of at least 6. The spell is cast using your habilitat de llançament de conjurs, targeting the creature that activates the item. If the spell targets more than one creature, the creature that activates the item selects the additional targets. If the spell has an area of effect, it is centered on the item. If the spell's range is self, it targets the creature that activates the item.

When you infuse a spell in this way, it must be used within 8 hours. After that time, its magic fades and is wasted. You can have a limited number of infused spells at the same time. The number equals el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència.

classFeature.name: Servent Mecànic
entries: A nivell 6, your research and mastery of your craft allow you to produce a servent mecànic. The servant is a construct that obeys your commands without hesitation and functions in combat to protect you. Though magic fuels its creation, the servant is not magical itself. You are assumed to have been working on the servant for quite some time, finally finishing it during a short or long rest after you reach 6th level.

Select a Large beast with a challenge rating of 2 or less. The servant uses that beast's game statistics, but it can look however you like, as long as its form is appropriate for its statistics. It has the following modifications:

items: It is a construct instead of a beast.
It can't be {@condition charmed}.
It is immune to poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition.
It gains {@sense darkvision} amb un abast de 60 peus if it doesn't have it already.
It understands the languages you can speak when you create it, but it can't speak.

If you are the target of a atac cos a cos and the servant is within 5 feet of the attacker, pots, com a reacció, command the servant to respond, using its reaction to make a atac cos a cos against the attacker.

entries: The servant obeys your orders to the best of its ability. In combat, it rolls its own initiative and acts on its own.

If the servant is killed, it can be returned to life via normal means, such as with the {@spell revifar} spell. A més, over the course of a long rest, you can repair a slain servant if you have access to its body. It returns to life with 1 punt de vida at the end of the rest. If the servant is beyond recovery, you can build a new one with one week of work (eight hours each day) and 1,000 gp of raw materials.

classFeature.name: Andròmines Màgiques
entries: A nivell 1, you learn how to invest a spark of magic in objects that would otherwise be mundane. To use this ability, you must have {@item eines de lladre|PHB}, {@item tinker's eines|PHB}, or other {@item eines d'artesania|PHB} in hand. You then touch a Tiny nonmagical object com a acció and give it one of the following magical properties (escull):

items: The object sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

Whenever tapped by a creature, the object emits a recorded message that can be heard fins a 10 peus away. You utter the message when you bestow this property on the object, and the recording can be no more than 6 seconds long.
The object continuously emits your choice of an odor or a nonverbal sound (wind, waves, chirping, or the like). The chosen phenomenon is perceivable fins a 10 peus away.
A static visual effect appears on one of the object's surfaces. This effect can be a picture, up to 25 words of text, lines and shapes, or a mixture of these elements, as you like.

entries: The chosen property lasts indefinitely. Com a acció, you can touch the object and end the property early.

You can give the magic of this feature to multiple objects, touching one object each time you use the feature, and a single object can bear only one of the properties at a time. The maximum number of objects you can affect with the feature at one time is equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim d'1 object). If you try to exceed your maximum, the oldest property immediately ends, and then the new property applies.

classFeature.name: Llançament de Conjurs
entries: You have studied the workings of magic, how to channel it through objects, and how to awaken it within them. As a result, you have gained a limited ability to cast spells. To observers, you don't appear to be casting spells in a conventional way; you look as if you're producing wonders through various items.

entries.name: Tools Required
entries: You produce your artificer spell effects through your tools. You must have a spellcasting focus—specifically {@item eines de lladre|phb} or some kind of artisan's tool—in hand when you cast any spell with this Spellcasting feature. You must be proficient with the tool to use it in this way. See chapter 5, "{@book Equipment|phb|6|eines}," in the Player's Handbook for descriptions of these tools.
After you gain the Infusionar Objecte feature a nivell 2, you can also use any item bearing one of your infusions as a spellcasting focus.

entries.name: Trucs
entries: A nivell 1, coneixes 2 trucs (escull) from the {@filter artificer spell list|spells|class=artificer (uaar)}. A nivells superiors, aprendràs més trucs de artificer (escull), que pots veure a la Columna de Trucs Coneguts de la taula de Artificer.
When you gain a level en aquesta classe, you can replace one of the artificer cantrips you know with another cantrip from the artificer spell list.

entries.name: Preparar i Llançar Conjurs
entries: The Artificer table mostra les ranures de conjur que tens per llançar els artificer spells. To cast one of your artificer spells of 1st level or higher, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. Recuperes totes les ranures de conjur quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

Pots preparar la llista de artificer spells that are available for you to cast, choosing from the {@filter artificer spell list|spells|class=artificer (uaar)}. Esculls un número de artificer spells equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència + half your artificer level, arrodonint a la baixa (mínim d'1 conjur). Has de tenir una ranura del nivell d'un conjur per a poder preparar-lo.

For example, if you are a artificier de nivell 5, you have four 1st-level and two 2nd-level ranures de conjur. With an Intel·ligència of 14, your list of prepared spells can include four spells of 1st or 2nd level, in any combination. Si et prepares el conjur de nivell 1 {@spell curar ferides}, you can cast it using a 1st-level or a 2nd-level slot. Casting the spell doesn't remove it from your list of prepared spells.

You can change your list of prepared spells quan acabis un Descans Llarg. Preparar una nova llista de artificer spells requires time spent in tinkering with your spellcasting focuses: at least 1 minute per spell level for each spell on your list.

entries: La teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs pels conjurs de artificer és l'Intel·ligència; your understanding of the theory behind magic allows you to wield these spells with superior skill. A més, you use el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència when setting the saving throw DC for an artificer spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one.

entries.name: Llançar com a Ritual
entries: You can cast an artificer spell as a ritual if that spell has the ritual tag and you have the spell prepared.

entries.name: The Magic of Artifice
entries: As an artificer, you use tools when you cast your spells. When describing your spellcasting, think about how you're using a tool to perform the spell effect. If you cast {@spell curar ferides} using {@item alchemist's supplies|PHB}, you could be quickly producing a salve. If you cast it using {@item tinker's eines|phb}, you might have a miniature mechanical spider that binds wounds. When you cast {@spell poison spray}, you could fling foul chemicals or use a wand that spits venom. The effect of the spell is the same as for a spellcaster of any other class, but your method of spellcasting is special.

The same principle applies when you prepare your spells. As an artificer, you don't study a spellbook or pray to prepare your spells. Instead, you work with your tools and create the specialized items you'll use to produce your effects. If you replace {@spell curar ferides} with {@spell shocking grasp}, you might be breaking down the device you used to heal and creating an offensive item in its place—perhaps a gauntlet that lets you channel a surge of energy.

Such details don't limit you in any way or provide you with any benefit. You don't have to justify how you're using tools to cast a spell. But describing your spellcasting creatively is a fun way to distinguish yourself from other spellcasters.

classFeature.name: Infusionar Objecte
entries: A nivell 2, you gain the ability to imbue mundane items with certain magical infusions. The magic items you create with this feature are effectively prototypes of permanent items.

entries.name: Infusions Known
entries: When you gain this feature, pick three artificer infusions to learn, choosing from the "{@filter Artificer Infusions|optionalfeatures|feature type=ai|source=UAArtificerRevisited}" section at the end of the class's description. You learn additional infusions (escull) Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown in the Infusions Known column of the Artificer table.
Quan puges de nivell en aquesta classe, you can replace one of the artificer infusions you learned with a new one.

entries.name: Infusing an Item
entries: Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can touch a nonmagical object and imbue it with one of your artificer infusions, turning it into a magic item. An infusion works on only certain kinds of objects, as specified in the infusion's description. If the item requires attunement, you can attune yourself to it the instant you infuse the item, or you can forgo attunement so that someone else can attune to the item. If you decide to attune to the item later, you must do so using the normal process for attunement (see "{@book Attunement|dmg|7|attunement}" in the Guia del Mestre de Masmorres, page 136).

Your infusion remains in an item indefinitely, but when you die, the infusion vanishes after a number of days have passed equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim d'1 day). The infusion also vanishes if you give up your knowledge of the infusion for another one.

You can infuse more than one nonmagical object quan acabis un Descans Llarg; the maximum number of objects appears in the Infused Items column of the Artificer table. You must touch each of the objects, and each of your infusions can be in only one object at a time. If you try to exceed your maximum number of infusions, the oldest infusion immediately ends, and then the new infusion applies.

entries.name: Artificer Infusions
entries: Artificers have invented numerous magical infusions that rapidly create magic items. To the untrained, artificers seem like wonderworkers, accomplishing in hours what others need weeks to complete.
The description of each infusion tells you the type of item that can receive it. The description also tells you if the resulting magic item requires attunement.
Some infusions specify a minimum artificer level. You can't learn such an infusion until you are at least that level.
Unless an infusion's description says otherwise, you can't learn the infusion more than once.
See the {@filter Class Feature Options page|optionalfeatures|feature type=ai|source=UAArtificerRevisited} for the full list of infusions.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 16 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Objecte Guarda-Conjurs
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 18, you learn how to store a spell in an object for repeated use. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can touch one simple or martial weapon or an item that you can use as a spellcasting focus and store a spell in it, choosing one 1st- or 2nd-level spell from the {@filter artificer spell list|spells|class=artificer (uaar)|cast time=action|level=1;2} that requires 1 action to cast (you don't need to have the spell prepared). With the object in hand, a creature can take an action to produce the spell's effect from it, using your modificador d'habilitat de llançament de conjurs.
The spell stays in the object until it has been used a number of times equal to twice el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (minimum of twice) or fins que tornis a emprar aquest tret.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 19, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 19 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Ànima d'Artifici
entries: A nivell 20, your understanding of magic items is unmatched, allowing you to mingle your soul with items linked to you. You can attune to up to six magic items at once. A més, Tens un +1 a all saving throws per magic item you are currently attuned to.

subclassFeature.name: Alchemist
entries: An Alchemist is an expert at combining reagents to produce mystical effects. Alchemists use their creations to give life and to leech it away. Alchemy is the oldest of artificer traditions, and its versatility has long been valued during times of war and peace.

subclassFeature.name: Alchemist Spells
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels en aquesta classe, as shown in the Alchemist Spells table. Aquests conjurs es consideren conjurs d'artificier per a tu, però no compten vers el número de conjurs d'artificier que pots preparar.

entries.caption: Alchemist Spells
rows: {@spell esfera de flames}, {@spell Fletxa Acida d'en Melf}

subclassFeature.name: Experimental Elixir
entries: Començant a nivell 3, quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can magically produce an {@i experimental elixir} in an empty flask you touch. Roll on the Experimental Elixir table for the elixir's effect, which is triggered when someone drinks the elixir. Com a acció, a creature can drink the elixir or administer it to an {@condition incapacitated} creature.

Creating an {@i experimental elixir} requires you to have {@item alchemist's supplies|PHB} on your person, and any elixir you create with this feature lasts until it is drunk or until the end of your next long rest.

Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, you can make more elixirs quan acabis un Descans Llarg: two a nivell 6 and three a nivell 15. Roll for each elixir's effect separately. Each elixir requires its own flask.

You can create additional {@i experimental elixirs} by expending a spell slot of 1st level or higher for each one. When you do so, you use your action to create the elixir in an empty flask you touch, and you choose the elixir's effect from the Experimental Elixir table.

entries.caption: Experimental Elixir
rows: {@b Healing}. The drinker regains a number of punts de vida equal to {@dice 2d4} + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència.
{@b Swiftness}. The drinker's walking speed increases by 10 feet durant 1 hora.
{@b Resilience}. The drinker gains a +1 bonus to AC durant 10 minuts.
{@b Boldness}. The drinker can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to every attack roll and saving throw they make for the next minute.
{@b Flight}. The drinker gains una velocitat de vol de 10 peus durant 10 minuts.

{@b Transformation}. The drinker's body is transformed as if by the {@spell ego alteració} spell. The drinker determines the transformation caused by the spell, the effects of which last durant 10 minuts.

subclassFeature.name: Tool Proficiency
entries: When you adopt this specialization a nivell 3, tens competència amb {@item alchemist's supplies|PHB}. If you already have this proficiency, tens competència amb one other type of {@item eines d'artesania|PHB} (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Alchemical Savant
entries: A nivell 5, you develop masterful command of magical chemicals, enhancing the healing and damage you create through them. Whenever you cast a spell using your {@item alchemist's supplies|PHB} as the spellcasting focus, you gain a bonus to one roll of the spell. That roll must restore punts de vida or be a damage roll that deals acid, fire, necrotic, or poison damage, and the bonus equals el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim de +1).

subclassFeature.name: Restorative Reagents
entries: Començant a nivell 9, you can incorporate restorative reagents into some of your works:

items: Whenever a creature drinks an {@i experimental elixir} you created, the creature gains punts de vida temporals equal to {@dice 2d6} + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim d'1 punt de vida temporal).

Pots llançar el conjur {@spell restabliment menor} sense gastar cap ranura de conjur and without preparing the spell, provided you use {@item alchemist's supplies|PHB} as the spellcasting focus. You can do so a number of times equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim 1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Chemical Mastery
entries: A nivell 15, you have been exposed to so many chemicals that they pose little risk to you, and you can use them to quickly end certain ailments:

items: You gain resistance to acid damage and poison damage, and you are immune to the {@condition poisoned} condition.

Pots llançar el conjur {@spell restabliment superior} i {@spell heal} sense gastar cap ranura de conjur, without preparing the spell, and sense necessitar components materials, provided you use {@item alchemist's supplies|PHB} as the spellcasting focus. Once you cast either spell with this feature, you can't cast that spell with it again fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Armadura
entries: An artificer who specializes as an Armorer modifies armor to function almost like a second skin. The armor is enhanced to hone the artificer's magic, unleash potent attacks, and generate a formidable defense. The artificer bonds with this armor, becoming one with it even as they experiment with it and refine its magical capabilities.

subclassFeature.name: Armadura Arcana
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 3}

Els teus avenços metal·lúrgics t'han permès conduir la teva màgia a dins d'una armadura. Com a acció, pots tornar una armadura que vesteixis en una  Armadura Arcana, sempre que tinguis {@item eines de ferrer|PHB}.
Reps els beneficis següents mentre vesteixis l'armadura:

items: Si l'armadura té un requeriment de Força, no la té per a tu.
La pots emprar com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus artificer spells.

L'armadura se't vincula i no se't pot treure en contra de la teva voluntat. També cobreix tot el teu cos, però en pots et pots treure o posar com a acció bonus. L'armadura reemplaça tota extremitat que falti, i funciona com si fos l'extremitat.
Pots posar-te i treure l'armadura com a acció. L'armadura continua sent una Armadura Arcana fins que et posis una altra armadura o moris.

subclassFeature.name: Model d'Armadura
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 3}
Pots personalitzar-te l'Armadura Arcana. Escull un dels models d'armadura següents. Guardià o Infiltració. El model que escullis et dona beneficis mentres el duguis.
Cada model inclous una arma especial. Quan ataques amb aquella arma, pots emprar teu modificador d'Intel·ligència en ves del de Força o Destresa a les tirades d'impactar i de dany.
Pots canviar el model de l'armadura quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg, sempre que tingus les {@item eines de ferrer|PHB}.

entries.name: Guardià
entries: Dissenyes l'armadura perquè estigui a la vanguarda del conflicte. Té els trets següents:

items.name: Guants de Tro.
items.entry: Cada gua de l'armadura es considera una arma simple cos a cos mentre no duguis res amb aquella ma. Quan impacta, fa {@damage 1d8} de dany de tro. Una criatura impactada pel gua té desavantatge a tirades d'impacte contra altres objectius que no siguin tu fins l'inici del teu proper torn: l'armadura emet un pols distraient quan la criatura ataca a algú altre.

items.name: Camp Defensiu.
items.entry: Com a acció bonus, reps el teu nivell en aquesta classe de punts de vida temporals (reemplaça punts de vida temporals que ja tinguessis). Perds aquests punts de vida temporals si et treus l'armadura. Pots prendre aquesta acció bonus tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

entries.name: Infiltració
entries: Personalitzes l'armadura per a treballs subtils. Té els trets següents:

items.name: Canó Elèctric.
items.entry: Un node fet com de gema apareix en un puny o al pit (escull). Es considera una arma simple a distància, amb 90 peus d'abast normal i 300 peus d'abast llarg. Quan impacta fa {@damage 1d6} de dany elèctric. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb el Canó, fas {@damage 1d6} de dany elèctric extra a aquell objectiu.

items.name: Passes Poderoses.
items.entry: La teva velocitat de caminar incrementa en 5 peus.

items.name: Camp Reductor.
items.entry: Tens avantatge a tirades de Destresa ({@skill Stealth}). Si l'armadura imposa naturalment avantatge a aquestes tirades, ambdós es cancelen i tires normal.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs d'Armadura
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 3}

Tencs certs conjurs sempre preparats quan arribes a certs nivells en aquesta classe; consulta la taula de Conjurs d'Armadura. Aquests conjurs es consideren conjurs d'artificier per a tu, però no compten vers el número de conjurs d'artificier que pots preparar.

subclassFeature.name: L'Eina per a la Feina
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 3}
Tens competència amb armadures pesades. També tens competència amb {@item eines de ferrer|PHB}; si ja la tenies, obténs competència amb una altra mena d'{@item eines d'artesania|PHB} (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 5}
Pots atacar 2 cops, i no 1, quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Modificacions d'Armadura
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 9}

Aprens com emprar les teves infusions d'artificier per a modificar especialment la teva Armadura Arcana. L'armadura es considera objectes separats per a Infusionar Objectes feature: l'armadura (el pit), les botes, el casc, i l'arma especial de l'armadura. Cada objecte pot tenir una de les teves infusions, i les infusions es transfereixen si canvies el model de l'armadur amb el tret Model d'Armadura. A més, el número màxim d'objectes que pots infusionar incrementa en 2, però aquests objectes extra han de ser part de l'Armadura Arcana.

subclassFeature.name: Armadura Perfeccionada
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 15}
La teva Armadura Arcana rep beneficis adicionals segons el seu model.

entries.name: Guardià
entries: Quan una criatura Enorme o menor que puguis veure acaba el seu torn a 30 peus de tu, pots, com a reacció, forçar-la màgicament a salvar per Força contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur. Si falla, l'estibes fins a 30 peus cap a tu en un espai desocupat. Si aquest moviment la deixa a 5 peus de tu, pots fer-li un atac armat cos a cos com a part d'aquesta reacció.
Pots prendre aquesta reacció tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

entries.name: Infiltració
entries: Tota criatura que reby dany del teu Canó Elèctric brilla amb llum màgica fins l'inici del teu proper torn. Aquesta brillantor radia llum tènue a 5 peus, i la criatura té desavantatge a tirades d'impacte contra tu, ja que s'electroxoca si t'ataca. A més, la propera tirada d'impacte contra la criatura té avantatge; i, si l'atac impacta, l'objectiu rep {@damage 1d6} de dany elèctric extra.

subclassFeature.name: Artillerist
entries: An Artillerist specializes in using magic to hurl energy, projectiles, and explosions on a battlefield. This destructive power was valued by all the armies of the Last War. Now that the war is over, some members of this specialization have sought to build a more peaceful world by using their powers to fight the resurgence of strife in Khorvaire.

The gnome artificer Vi, an unlikely yet key member of House Cannith's warforged project, has been especially vocal about making things right: "It's about time we fixed things instead of blowing them all to hell."

subclassFeature.name: Artillerist Spells
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels en aquesta classe, as shown in the Artillerist Spells table. Aquests conjurs es consideren conjurs d'artificier per a tu, però no compten vers el número de conjurs d'artificier que pots preparar.

entries.caption: Artillerist Spells
rows: {@spell bola de foc}, {@spell paret del vent}
{@spell tempesta de gel}, {@spell paret de foc}
{@spell con de fred}, {@spell paret de força}

subclassFeature.name: Eldritch Cannon
entries: A nivell 3, you learn how to create a magical cannon. Using {@item woodcarver's eines|PHB} or {@item eines de ferrer|PHB}, you can take an action to magically create a Small or Tiny eldritch cannon en un espai desocupat on a horizontal surface a 5 peus de tu. A Small eldritch cannon occupies its space, and a Tiny one can be held in one hand.

Once you create a cannon, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg or until you expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. You can have only one cannon at a time and can't create one while your cannon is present.

The cannon is a magical object. Regardless of size, the cannon has an AC of 18 and a number of punts de vida equal to five times your artificer level. It is immune to poison damage and psychic damage, and all conditions. If it is forced to make an ability check or a saving throw, treat all its ability scores as 10 (+0). If the {@spell mending} spell is cast on it, it regains {@dice 2d6} punts de vida. It disappears if it is reduced to 0 punts de vida or after 1 hour. You can dismiss it early com a acció.

When you create the cannon, en determines l'aparença and whether it has legs. You also decide which type it is, choosing from the options on the Eldritch Cannons table. A cada torn teu, you can take a bonus action to cause the cannon to activate if you are within 60 feet of it. As part of the same bonus action, you can direct the cannon to walk or climb fins a 15 peus en un espai desocupat, provided it has legs.

entries.caption: Eldritch Cannons
rows: The cannon exhales fire in an adjacent 15-foot cone that you designate. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur, taking {@damage 2d8} de dany de foc si falla ; si supera, en rep la meitat. El foc encèn tot objecte inflamable dins de l'àrea que ningú estigui portant o vestint.

Make a atac màgic a distància, originating from the cannon, at one creature or object within 120 feet of it. On a hit, L'objectiu rep {@damage 2d8} de dany de força, and if the target is a creature, it is pushed fins a 5 peus away from the cannon.

The cannon emits a burst of positive energy that grants itself and tota criatura que designis within 10 feet of it a number of punts de vida temporals equal to {@damage 1d8} + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim de +1).

subclassFeature.name: Tool Proficiency
entries: When you adopt this specialization a nivell 3, tens competència amb {@item woodcarver's eines|PHB}. If you already have this proficiency, tens competència amb one other type of {@item eines d'artesania|PHB} (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Firearm
entries: A nivell 5, you know how to turn a wand, staff, or rod into an arcane firearm, a conduit for your destructive spells. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can use {@item woodcarver's eines|PHB} to carve special sigils into a wand, staff, or rod and thereby turn it into your arcane firearm. The sigils disappear from the object if you later carve them on a different item. The sigils otherwise last indefinitely.

You can use your arcane firearm com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus artificer spells. When you cast an artificer spell through the firearm, roll a {@damage d8}, and you gain a bonus to one of the spell's damage rolls equal to the number rolled.

subclassFeature.name: Explosive Cannon
entries: Començant a nivell 9, every eldritch cannon you create is more destructive:

items: The cannon's damage rolls all increase by {@damage 1d8}.

Com a acció, you can command the cannon to detonate if you are within 60 feet of it. Doing so destroys the cannon and forces tota criatura within 20 feet of it to make a Destresa contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur, taking {@damage 3d8} de dany de força si falla ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

subclassFeature.name: Fortified Position
entries: Començant a nivell 15, you're a master at forming well-defended emplacements using Eldritch Cannon:

items: You and your allies have half cover while within 10 feet of a cannon you create with Eldritch Cannon, as a result of a shimmering field of magical protection that the cannon emits.

You can now have two cannons at the same time. You can create two with the same action (but not the same spell slot), and you can activate both of them with the same bonus action. You determine whether the cannons are identical to each other or different. You can't create a third cannon while you have two.

subclassFeature.name: Battle Smith
entries: Armies require protection, and someone has to put things back together if defenses fail. A combination of protector and medic, a Battle Smith is an expert at defending others and repairing both material and personnel. To aid in their work, Battle Smiths are usually accompanied by a defensor d'acer, a protective companion of their own creation. Many soldiers tell stories of nearly dying before being saved by a Battle Smith and a defensor d'acer.

Battle Smiths played a key role in House Cannith's work on battle constructs and the original warforged, and after the Last War, these artificers led efforts to aid those who were injured in the war's horrific battles.

subclassFeature.name: Battle Ready
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 3, your combat training and your experiments with magic have paid off in two ways:

items: Tens competència amb martial weapons.
When you attack with a arma màgica, you can use el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència, instead of Força or Destresa modifier, for the attack and damage rolls.

subclassFeature.name: Battle Smith Spells
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels en aquesta classe, as shown in the Battle Smith Spells table. Aquests conjurs es consideren conjurs d'artificier per a tu, però no compten vers el número de conjurs d'artificier que pots preparar.

entries.caption: Battle Smith Spells
rows: {@spell aura de puresa}, {@spell escut de foc}

subclassFeature.name: Defensor d'Acer
entries: A nivell 3, your tinkering has borne you a faithful companion, a {@creature defensor d'acer|tce}. It is friendly to you and your companions, and it obeys your commands. See this creature's game statistics in the defensor d'acer stat block, which uses el teu bonus de competència (BC) in several places. You determine the creature's appearance and whether it has two legs or four; your choice has no effect on its game statistics.

In combat, the defender shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but the only action it takes on its turn is l'acció {@action Esquivar}, unless you take a bonus action en el teu torn to command it to take another action. That action can be one in its stat block or some other action. Si et quedes {@condition incapacitated}, the defender can take any action of its choice, not just {@action Esquivar}.

If the {@spell mending} spell is cast on it, it regains {@dice 2d6} punts de vida. If it has died within the last hour, you can use your {@item eines de ferrer|PHB} com a acció to revive it, provided you are within 5 feet of it and you expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The defensor d'acer returns to life after 1 minute with all its punts de vida restored.

Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can create a new defensor d'acer if you have your {@item eines de ferrer|PHB} with you. If you already have a defensor d'acer from this feature, the first one immediately perishes. The defender also perishes if you die.

subclassFeature.name: Tool Proficiency
entries: When you adopt this specialization a nivell 3, tens competència amb {@item eines de ferrer|PHB}. If you already have this proficiency, tens competència amb one other type of {@item eines d'artesania|PHB} (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, you can attack twice, rather than once, quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Jolt
entries: A nivell 9, you learn new ways to channel arcane energy to harm or heal. When either you hit a target with a arma màgica attack or your defensor d'acer hits a target, you can channel magical energy through the strike to create one of the following effects:

items: L'objectiu rep an extra {@damage 2d6} de dany de força.
Choose one creature or object que puguis veure within 30 feet of the target. Healing energy flows into the chosen recipient, restoring {@dice 2d6} punts de vida to it.

entries: You can use this energy a number of times equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim 1 cop), but you can do so no more than once on a turn. En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Improved Defender
entries: A nivell 15, your Arcane Jolt and defensor d'acer become more powerful:

items: The extra damage and the healing of your Arcane Jolt both increase to {@damage 4d6}.
Your defensor d'acer gains a +2 bonus to Armor Class.
Whenever your defensor d'acer uses its Deflect Attack, the attacker takes force damage equal to {@damage 1d4} + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència.

subclassFeature.name: Armadura
entries: An artificer who specializes as an Armorer modifies armor to function almost like a second skin. The armor is enhanced to hone the artificer's magic, unleash potent attacks, and generate a formidable defense. The artificer bonds with this armor, becoming one with it even as they experiment with it and refine its magical capabilities.

subclassFeature.name: Model d'Armadura
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 3}
You can customize your power armor. When you do so, choose one of the following model d'armaduras: guardian or infiltrator. The model you choose gives you special benefits while you wear it.
Each model includes a special weapon. When you attack with that weapon, you can use el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència, instead of Força or Destresa, for the attack and damage rolls.
You can change your power armor's model quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg, provided you have {@item eines de ferrer|PHB} in hand.

entries.name: Guardian
entries: You design your armor to be in the frontline of conflict. It has the following features:

items.name: Thunder Gauntlets.
items.entry: Your armored fists each count as a simple melee weapon, and each deals {@damage 1d8} de dany de tro on a hit. A creature hit by the gauntlet té desavantatge a tirades d'impacte against targets other than you fins l'inici del teu proper torn, as the armor magically emits a distracting pulse when the creature attacks someone else.

items.name: Defensive Field.
items.entry: You gain a bonus action that you can use a cada torn teu to gain punts de vida temporals equal to el teu nivell en aquesta classe, replacing any punts de vida temporals you already have. You lose these punts de vida temporals if you doff the armor.

entries.name: Infiltrator
entries: You customize your armor for subtle undertakings. It has the following features:

items.name: Lightning Launcher.
items.entry: A gemlike node appears on one of your armored fists or on the chest (escull). It counts as a simple ranged weapon, with a normal range of 90 feet and a long range of 300 feet, and it deals {@damage 1d6} de dany elèctric on a hit. Un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura with it, you can deal an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany elèctric to that target.

items.name: Powered Steps.
items.entry: La teva velocitat de caminar incrementa en 5 peus.

items.name: Second Skin.
items.entry: The armor's weight is negligible, and it becomes formfitting and wearable under clothing. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on Destresa ({@skill Stealth}), the power armor doesn't.

subclassFeature.name: Conjurs d'Armadura
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 3}

You always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels en aquesta classe, as shown in the Conjurs d'Armadura table. Aquests conjurs es consideren conjurs d'artificier per a tu, però no compten vers el número de conjurs d'artificier que pots preparar.

subclassFeature.name: Power Armor
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 3}

Your metallurgical pursuits have led to you making armor a conduit for your artificer magic. Com a acció, you can turn a suit of heavy armor you are wearing into power armor, provided you have {@item eines de ferrer|PHB} in hand.
Reps els beneficis següents while wearing the power armor:

items: If the armor normally has a Força requirement, the power armor lacks this requirement for you.
You can use the power armor com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus artificer spells.

The power armor attaches to you and can't be removed against your will. It also expands to cover your entire body, and it replaces any missing limbs, functioning identically to a body part it is replacing.

entries: The armor continues to be power armor until you doff it, you don another suit of armor, or you die.

subclassFeature.name: L'Eina per a la Feina
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 3}

Tens competència amb heavy armor. You also gain proficiency with {@item eines de ferrer|PHB}. If you already have this tool proficiency, tens competència amb one other type of {@item eines d'artesania|PHB} (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 5}
You can attack twice, rather than once, quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Modificacions d'Armadura
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 9}

You learn how to use your artificer infusions to specially modify the armor enhanced by your Power Armor feature. That armor now counts as separate items for the purposes of your Infusionar Objectes feature: armor (the chest piece), boots, bracers, and a weapon. Each of those items can bear one of your infusions. A més, the maximum number of items you can infuse at once increases by 2, but those extra items must be part of your power armor.

subclassFeature.name: Armadura Perfeccionada
entries: {@i tret d'Armadura a nivell 15}
Your power armor gains additional benefits based on its model, as shown below.

entries.name: Guardian
entries: Tinkering with your armor's energy system leads you to discover a powerful pulling force. Quan una criatura que puguis veure ends its turn a 30 peus de tu, pots, com a reacció, force the creature to succeed on a Força contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur or be pulled fins a 30 peus toward you en un espai desocupat. If you pull the target to space a 5 peus de tu, you can fer un atac armat cos a cos against it as part of this reaction.
Pots prendre aquesta reacció a number of times equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim 1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

entries.name: Infiltrator
entries: Any creature that takes lightning damage from your Lightning Launcher glimmers with light fins l'inici del teu proper torn. The glimmering creature sheds dim light in a 5 foot radius, and the next attack roll against it by a creature other than you has advantage. If that attack hits, it deals an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany elèctric.

subclassFeature.name: Alchemist
entries: An alchemist is an expert at combining exotic reagents to produce a variety of materials, from healing draughts that can mend a wound in moments to clinging goo that slows creatures down.

subclassFeature.name: Alchemical Formula
entries: A nivell 1, you learn three Alchemical Formula options: Alchemical Fire, Alchemical Acid, and one other option (escull). You learn an additional formula (escull) at 3rd, 9th, 14th, and 17th levels.
To use any of these options, your Alchemist's Satchel must be within reach.
If an Alchemical Formula option requires a saving throw, the DC is 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència.

subclassFeature.name: Alchemist's Satchel
entries: A nivell 1, you craft an Alchemist's Satchel, a bag of reagents that you use to create a variety of concoctions. The bag and its contents are both magical, and this magic allows you to pull out exactly the right materials you need for your Alchemical Formula options, described below. After you use one of those options, the bag reclaims the materials.
If you lose this satchel, you can create a new one over the course of three days of work (eight hours each day) by expending 100 gp worth of leather, glass, and other raw materials.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Alchemical Formula
entries: A nivell 3, you learn an additional Alchemical Formula.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Alchemical Formula
entries: A nivell 9, you learn an additional Alchemical Formula.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Alchemical Formula
entries: A nivell 14, you learn an additional Alchemical Formula.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Alchemical Formula
entries: A nivell 17, you learn an additional Alchemical Formula.

subclassFeature.name: Gunsmith
entries: A master of engineering, you forge a firearm powered by a combination of science and magic.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Magazine
entries: A nivell 1, you craft a leather bag used to carry your tools and ammunition for your Thunder Cannon. Your Arcane Magazine includes the powders, lead shot, and other materials needed to keep that weapon functioning.

You can use the Arcane Magazine to produce ammunition for your gun. At the end of each long rest, you can magically produce 40 rounds of ammunition with this magazine. After each short rest, you can produce 10 rounds.
If you lose your Arcane Magazine, you can create a new one as part of a long rest, using 25 gp of leather and other raw materials.

subclassFeature.name: Master Smith
entries: When you choose this specialization a nivell 1, tens competència amb {@item eines de ferrer|phb}, and you learn the mending cantrip.

subclassFeature.name: Thunder Cannon
entries: A nivell 1, you forge a deadly firearm using a combination of arcane magic and your knowledge of engineering and metallurgy. This firearm is called a Thunder Cannon. It is a ferocious weapon that fires leaden bullets that can punch through armor with ease.

You are proficient with the Thunder Cannon. The firearm is a two-handed ranged weapon that deals {@damage 2d6} de dany perforant. Its normal range is 150 feet, and its maximum range if 500 feet. Once fired, it must be reloaded com a acció bonus.
If you lose your Thunder Cannon, you can create a new one over the course of three days of work (eight hours each day) by expending 100 gp worth of metal and other raw materials.

subclassFeature.name: Thunder Monger
entries: A nivell 3, you learn to channel thunder energy into your Thunder Cannon. Com a acció, you can make a special attack with your Thunder Cannon that deals an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany de tro on a hit.

This extra damage increases by {@damage 1d6} Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe: 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 7th level ({@damage 3d6}), 9th level ({@damage 4d6}), 11th level ({@damage 5d6}), 13th level ({@damage 6d6}), 15th level ({@damage 7d6}), 17th level ({@damage 8d6}), and 19th level ({@damage 9d6}).

subclassFeature.name: Blast Wave
entries: Començant a nivell 9, you can channel force energy into your Thunder Cannon. Com a acció, you can make a special attack with it. Rather than making an attack roll, you unleash force energy in a 15-foot cone from the gun. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Força with a DC of 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència. On a failed saving throw, a target takes {@damage 2d6} de dany de força and is pushed 10 peus lluny de tu.
This damage increases by {@damage 1d6} Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe: 13th level ({@damage 3d6}) and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).

subclassFeature.name: Piercing Round
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you can shoot lightning energy through your Thunder Cannon. Com a acció, you can make a special attack with it. Rather than making an attack roll, you cause the gun to unleash a bolt of lightning, 5-feet wide and 30-feet long. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make Destresa saving throws with a DC of 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència. On a failed saving throw, a target takes {@damage 4d6} de dany elèctric. This damage increases to {@damage 6d6} quan arribes a nivell 19 en aquesta classe.

subclassFeature.name: Explosive Round
entries: Començant a nivell 17, you can channel fiery energy into your Thunder Cannon. Com a acció, you can make a special attack with it. Rather than making an attack roll, you launch an explosive round from the gun. The round detonates in a 30-foot radius sphere at a point within range. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa with a DC of 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència. On a failed saving throw, a target takes {@damage 4d8} de dany de foc.

subclassFeature.name: Alchemist
entries: An Alchemist is an expert at combining exotic reagents to produce mystical effects. Among artificers, members of this subclass are the greatest healers, as well as the ones most adept at wielding dangerous chemicals.

subclassFeature.name: Homúncul Alquímic
entries: A nivell 3, you learn ancient methods for magically creating a special homunculus that is formed by alchemical substances.

Quan acabis un Descans Llarg and your {@item alchemist's supplies|PHB} are with you, you can form this homunculus en un espai desocupat a 5 peus de tu. If you already have a homunculus from this feature, the first one immediately dies.

The homunculus is friendly to you and your companions, and it obeys your commands. See this creature's game statistics in the {@creature Alchemical Homunculus|uaartificerrevisited} stat block. You determine the homunculus's appearance, which includes wings and bits of alchemical equipment. Some alchemists prefer mechanical-looking birds, whereas others like winged vials or miniature cauldrons.

In combat, the homunculus shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. The only action it takes on its turn is l'acció {@action Esquivar}, unless you take a bonus action en el teu torn to command it to take one of the actions in its stat block or to take l'acció {@action Córrer}, {@action Destravar-se}, or {@action Ajudar}.

If the {@spell mending} spell is cast on it, it regains {@dice 2d6} punts de vida. If it has died within the last hour, you can use your {@item alchemist's supplies|PHB} com a acció to revive it, provided you are within 5 feet of it and you expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The homunculus returns to life with all its punts de vida restored.

subclassFeature.name: Alchemist Spells
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels en aquesta classe, as shown in the Alchemist Spells table. Aquests conjurs es consideren conjurs d'artificier per a tu, però no compten vers el número de conjurs d'artificier que pots preparar.

entries.caption: Alchemist Spells
rows: {@spell purify beguda i queviures}, {@spell raig d'arcada}
{@spell crear menjar i aigua}, {@spell núvol fètid}

subclassFeature.name: L'Eina per a la Feina
entries: By the time you adopt this specialty a nivell 3, you're deeply familiar with employing its tools.

entries.name: Proficiencies
entries: Tens competència amb {@item alchemist's supplies|phb} and the {@item herbalism kit|phb}, assuming you don't already have them. You also gain {@item alchemist's supplies|phb} and an {@item herbalism kit|phb} for free—the result of tinkering you've done as you've prepared for this specialization.

entries.name: Crafting
entries: If you craft a magic item in the potion category, it takes you a quarter of the normal time, and it costs you half as much of the usual gold.

subclassFeature.name: Alchemical Mastery
entries: A nivell 6, your command of magical chemicals has become masterful, enhancing the healing and damage you create through them. When you cast a spell using your {@item alchemist's supplies|phb} as the spellcasting focus, you gain a bonus to one roll of the spell. That roll must restore punts de vida or be a damage roll that deals acid or poison damage, and the bonus equals el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim de +1).

A més, Pots llançar el conjur {@spell restabliment menor} sense gastar cap ranura de conjur, provided you use {@item alchemist's supplies|phb} as the spellcasting focus. You can do so a number of times per day equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim 1 cop).

subclassFeature.name: Chemical Savant
entries: A nivell 14, you have been exposed to so many chemicals and unlocked their secrets that they pose little risk to you, and you can use them to quickly end certain ailments. You gain resistance to acid damage and poison damage, and you are now immune to the {@condition poisoned} condition.

A més, Pots llançar el conjur {@spell restabliment superior} un cop sense gastar cap ranura de conjur and without providing the material component, provided you use {@item alchemist's supplies|phb} as the spellcasting focus. You regain the ability to do so quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Archivist
entries: What are the best ways to store vast amounts of information? That question has occupied chroniclers and librarians for centuries. Scrolls and books were the finest information-storing methods for a long time, but the first Archivists imagined something greater: storing information in a real or an artificial mind. What library could match a mental archive capable of accessing information in seconds? As they work towards this goal, Archivists have become masters of storing knowledge and creating artificial intelligences fueled by magic. These techniques have yet to be perfected and institutionalized, and of all artificers, archivists are on the cutting edge of arcane science.

subclassFeature.name: Archivist Spells
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels en aquesta classe, as shown in the Archivist Spells table. Aquests conjurs es consideren conjurs d'artificier per a tu, però no compten vers el número de conjurs d'artificier que pots preparar.

subclassFeature.name: Artificial Mind
entries: A nivell 3, you discover how to awaken a mind inside an object. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg and your {@item calligrapher's supplies|PHB} are with you, you can magically rouse a keen mind within a Tiny, nonmagical object on which you write mystical symbols. The object is a magic item while the mind is inside it, and you can use it as a spellcasting focus. If you already have an artificial mind from this feature, the first one immediately dissipates.
The magic item has the following properties.

entries.name: Telepathic Advisor
entries: The artificial mind telepathically supplies you with advice and information about certain topics: while the item is on your person, you have proficiency in two skills (escull); the item's main material determines which skills you can choose from, as shown on the Artificial Mind table in the Skill Proficiencies column, for the nature of the object affects the mind's knowledge.

entries.name: Manifestar l'Enteniment
entries: Com a acció bonus while the item is on your person, you can cause the mind to manifest as a Tiny spectral presence, hovering en un espai desocupat (escull) a 60 peus de tu. This presence is intangible and invulnerable, and it sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius. En determines l'aparença; the Artificial Mind table offers suggested appearances based on the object's main material.

While manifested, the spectral mind can hear and see, and it has {@sense darkvision} amb un abast de 60 peus. Com a acció, you can hear and see using the mind's senses, instead of your own, until your concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

Com a acció bonus, you can cause the spectral mind to hover fins a 30 peus en un espai desocupat that you or it can see. It can pass through creatures but not objects. The spectral mind stops manifesting if it is ever more than 300 feet away from its magic item or if you dismiss it com a acció bonus.

When you cast an artificer spell en el teu torn, you can cast it as if you were in the spectral mind's space, instead of your own, using its senses. You can do so a number of times per day equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (at least once), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

entries.name: Information Overload
entries: Com a acció while the item is on your person, you can try to magically overload the thoughts of one creature you or the mind can see that is within 5 feet of the manifested mind, channeling a jumble of information from the artificial mind. Unless the target succeeds on an Intel·ligència contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur, L'objectiu rep {@damage 1d8} de dany psíquic, and the next attack roll against it before the end of your next turn has advantage, since it is temporarily too distracted to defend itself well. The damage increases by {@damage 1d8} quan arribes a nivell 5 ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}) en aquesta classe.

Whenever you deal damage with this feature, you can expend a spell slot to deal extra damage to the target. The extra damage is {@damage 2d8} for a 1st-level spell slot, plus {@damage 1d8} for each spell level higher than first.

entries.caption: Artificial Mind
rows: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Perception}, {@skill Survival}
A beast or a humanoid visage with antlers
A bespectacled visage or a treant

subclassFeature.name: The First Warforged Minds
entries: Warforged were originally created by House Cannith to fight as subservient beings, having limited self-awareness. The development of the autonomous warforged consciousness has been presented as an accidental breakthrough. However, rumors abound that it was the work of pioneering archivist Aaren d'Cannith, who planted the seed of autonomy in the warforged mind. This fact is now difficult to verify, for the development team's records were destroyed and Aaren d'Cannith disappeared under mysterious circumstances. Many believe that Aaren is still determined to help the warforged evolve and that he might be working with the sinister Lord of Blades.

subclassFeature.name: L'Eina per a la Feina
entries: By the time you adopt this specialty a nivell 3, you're deeply familiar with employing its tools.

entries.name: Proficiencies
entries: Tens competència amb {@item calligrapher's supplies|phb} and the {@item forgery kit|phb}, assuming you don't already have them. You also gain {@item calligrapher's supplies|PHB} i una {@item forgery kit|PHB} for free—the result of tinkering you've done as you've prepared for this specialization.

entries.name: Crafting
entries: If you craft a magic item in the scroll category, it takes you a quarter of the normal time, and it costs you half as much of the usual gold.

subclassFeature.name: Mind Network
entries: A nivell 6, you've learned how to use your artifices to access minds, both to communicate and to harm.

entries.name: Magical Telephony
entries: While you have your Artificial Mind item on your person, you can communicate telepathically with anyone carrying an item bearing one of your artificer infusions, as the mind transmits your thoughts to each other. That person can also communicate telepathically with you as long as they have the item. This two-way communication can even cross planar boundaries.

entries.name: Dany Psíquic
entries: When you make a psychic damage roll for an artificer spell or for Information Overload, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (minimum bonus of +1).

subclassFeature.name: Pure Information
entries: A nivell 14, your Artificial Mind is able to receive and transmit more information than ever before.

entries.name: Mind Overload
entries: When you expend a spell slot to increase the damage of Information Overload, the target must succeed on an Intel·ligència contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur or be {@condition stunned} fins el final del teu proper torn.

entries.name: Infoportation
entries: Com a acció while your Artificial Mind magic item is on your person, you cause the mind to turn you into pure information, teleporting you to the unoccupied space nearest to the spectral mind or to an item bearing one of your artificer infusions, where you physically reappear.
You can teleport in this way once for free and must finish a long rest before doing so again. You can also use this special ability by expending a spell slot of 2nd level or higher.

subclassFeature.name: Artillerist
entries: An Artillerist specializes in using magic to create explosions and defensive positions, as well as magic-infused sidearms—especially wands—that can be used on the battlefield. Artillerists were valued by all the armies of the Last War.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Turret
entries: A nivell 3, you learn how to create a magical turret. With your {@item eines de ferrer|phb} in hand, you can take an action to magically summon a Medium turret en un espai desocupat on a horizontal surface a 5 peus de tu.

The turret is a magical object that occupies its space and that has crablike legs. It has an AC of 18 and a number of punts de vida equal to five times your artificer level. It is immune to poison damage, psychic damage, and all conditions. If it is forced to make an ability check or a saving throw, treat all its ability scores as 10 (+0). If the {@spell mending} spell is cast on it, it regains {@dice 2d6} punts de vida. It disappears if it is reduced to 0 punts de vida or after 10 minutes. You can dismiss it early com a acció.

When you summon the turret, you decide which type it is, choosing from the options on the Arcane Turrets table. A cada torn teu, you can take a bonus action to cause the turret to activate if you are within 60 feet of it. As part of the same action, you can direct the turret to walk or climb fins a 15 peus en un espai desocupat.

You can summon a turret once for free and must finish a long rest before doing so again. You can also summon the turret by expending a spell slot of 1st level or higher. If you summon a second turret, the first turret disappears.

Com a acció, you can command your turret to detonate if you are within 60 feet of it. Doing so destroys the turret and forces tota criatura within 10 feet of it to make a Destresa contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur, taking {@damage 3d6} de dany de força si falla ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

entries.caption: Arcane Turrets
rows: The turret exhales fire in an adjacent 15-foot cone that you designate. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur, taking {@damage 1d8} de dany de foc si falla ; si supera, en rep la meitat. El foc encèn tot objecte inflamable dins de l'àrea que ningú estigui portant o vestint.

Make a atac màgic a distància, originating from the turret, at one creature or object within 120 feet of it. On a hit, L'objectiu rep {@damage 2d8} de dany de força, and if the target is a creature, it is pushed fins a 5 peus away from the turret.

The turret emits a burst of positive energy that grants itself and tota criatura que designis within 10 feet of it a number of punts de vida temporals equal to {@dice 1d8} + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim de +1).

subclassFeature.name: Artillerist Spells
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels en aquesta classe, as shown in the Alchemist Spells table. Aquests conjurs es consideren conjurs d'artificier per a tu, però no compten vers el número de conjurs d'artificier que pots preparar.

entries.caption: Artillerist Spells
rows: {@spell bola de foc}, {@spell paret del vent}
{@spell tempesta de gel}, {@spell paret de foc}
{@spell con de fred}, {@spell paret de força}

subclassFeature.name: L'Eina per a la Feina
entries: By the time you adopt this specialty a nivell 3, you're deeply familiar with employing its tools.

entries.name: Proficiencies
entries: Tens competència amb {@item eines de ferrer|phb} i {@item woodcarver's eines|phb}, assuming you don't already have them. You also gain those tools for free—the result of tinkering you've done as you've prepared for this specialization.
A més, you gain the ability to use rods, staffs, and wands as spellcasting focuses for your artificer spells. You also gain a nonmagical, wooden wand for free, which you've carved in your spare time.

entries.name: Crafting
entries: If you craft a magic item in the wand category, it takes you a quarter of the normal time, and it costs you half as much of the usual gold.

subclassFeature.name: Wand Prototype
entries: A nivell 6, you now regularly experiment with channeling different types of magic through wands. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg and your {@item woodcarver's eines|phb} are with you, you can touch a nonmagical, wooden wand and turn it into a magic item. When you do so, you invest it with one artificer cantrip (escull)—even one you don't know—that has a casting time of 1 action. Com a acció, you can cause the magic wand to produce the cantrip, using your modificador d'habilitat de llançament de conjurs (other creatures are unable to use the wand's magic). The wand loses this magic when you finish your next long rest.
Any damage roll you make for a cantrip in the wand gains a bonus equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim de +1).
Quan arribes a nivell 14 en aquesta classe, you can invest the wand with two cantrips quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Fortified Position
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you're a master at conjuring a well-defended emplacement. You and your allies have half cover while within 10 feet of a turret you create with Arcane Turret, as a result of a shimmering field of magical protection that the turret emits.

You can also now summon a second turret for free and must finish a long rest before doing so again. If you summon the second turret while the first is still present, the first one doesn't disappear, and each turret can be of a different type (if you summon a third turret, the first turret vanishes). Moreover, you can use one bonus action to activate both turrets.

subclassFeature.name: Battle Smith
entries: Armies require protection, and someone has to put things back together if defenses fail. A combination of protector and medic, a Battle Smith is an expert at defending others and repairing both materiel and personnel. To aid in their work, Battle Smiths are usually accompanied by an iron defender, a protective companion of their own creation. Many soldiers tell stories of nearly dying before being saved by a Battle Smith and an iron defender.

Battle Smiths played a key role in House Cannith's work on battle constructs and the original warforged, and after the Last War, these artificers led efforts to aid those who were injured in the war's horrific battles.
