subclassFeature.name: Battle Ready
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 3, your combat training and your experiments with magic and have paid off in two ways:

items: Tens competència amb martial weapons.
When you attack with a arma màgica, you can use el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència, instead of Força or Destresa, for the attack and damage rolls.

subclassFeature.name: Battle Smith Spells
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels en aquesta classe, as shown in the Battle Smith Spells table. Aquests conjurs es consideren conjurs d'artificier per a tu, però no compten vers el número de conjurs d'artificier que pots preparar.

subclassFeature.name: Defensor de Ferro
entries: A nivell 3, the tinkering in your free time has borne you a faithful companion, an iron defender. This metallic creature resembles a hound, a cougar, a bear, or another four-legged creature (escull). It is friendly to you and your companions, and it obeys your commands. See this creature's game statistics in the {@creature iron defender|uaartificerrevisited} stat block.

In combat, the iron defender shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but the only action it takes on its turn is l'acció {@action Esquivar}, unless you take a bonus action en el teu torn to command it to take one of the actions in its stat block or l'acció {@action Córrer}, {@action Destravar-se}, or {@action Ajudar}.

If the {@spell mending} spell is cast on it, it regains {@dice 2d6} punts de vida. If it has died within the last hour, you can use your {@item eines de ferrer|phb} com a acció to revive it, provided you are within 5 feet of it and you expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The iron defender returns to life after 1 minute with all its punts de vida restored.

Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can create a new iron defender if you have your {@item eines de ferrer|phb} with you. If you already have an iron defender from this feature, the first one immediately perishes.

subclassFeature.name: L'Eina per a la Feina
entries: By the time you adopt this specialty a nivell 3, you're deeply familiar with employing its tools.

entries.name: Proficiencies
entries: Tens competència amb {@item leatherworker's eines|phb} i {@item eines de ferrer|phb}, assuming you don't already have them. You also gain {@item leatherworker's eines|phb} i {@item eines de ferrer|phb} for free—the result of tinkering you've done as you've prepared for this specialization.

entries.name: Crafting
entries: If you craft a magic item in the armor category, it takes you a quarter of the normal time, and it costs you half as much of the usual gold.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Jolt
entries: A nivell 6, you learn new ways to channel arcane energy through your weapon attacks and your iron defender.
First, your iron defender's bite attack is now considered magical for the purposes of bypassing resistances and immunities, thanks to enhancements you've made to the creature in your free time.
Second, when you or your iron defender hits a target with a arma màgica attack, you can channel magical energy through the strike to create one of the following effects:

items: L'objectiu rep an extra {@damage 2d4} de dany de força.
Choose one creature or object que puguis veure within 30 feet of the target. Healing energy flows into the chosen recipient, restoring {@dice 2d4} punts de vida to it.

entries: You can channel this magical energy a number of times equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim 1 cop), but you can do so no more than once on a turn. En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Improved Defender
entries: A nivell 14, your Arcane Jolt and iron defender become more powerful:

items: The extra damage and the healing of your Arcane Jolt both increase to {@damage 4d4}.
Whenever your iron defender uses its Defensive Pounce, the attacker takes force damage equal to {@dice 1d4} + el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència.
